summary: Container class that holds the outputs of an Autoformer time‑series model, including the decoder’s last hidden states, the extracted trend tensor, optional cached key/value tensors for fast autoregressive decoding, attention matrices, encoder hidden states, and normalization parameters (loc, scale) together with any static covariates.
business_intent: Expose all relevant tensors produced by the Autoformer so that downstream forecasting pipelines can retrieve the predicted series, its trend component, and the necessary context (attention weights, cached states, scaling factors) for further analysis, post‑processing, or iterative generation.
